name: usergroups
description: Get info on your team's User Groups.

params.name: token
params.description:
Authentication token.
Requires scope: usergroups:write

params.name: name
params.description: A name for the User Group. Must be unique among User Groups.

params.name: handle
params.description: A mention handle. Must be unique among channels, users and User Groups.

params.name: description
params.description: A short description of the User Group.

params.name: channels
params.description: A comma separated string of encoded channel IDs for which the User Group uses as a default.

params.name: include_count
params.description: Include the number of users in each User Group.

response.sample: {"ok":true,"usergroup":{"id":"S0615G0KT","team_id":"T060RNRCH","is_usergroup":true,"name":"Marketing Team","description":"Marketing gurus, PR experts and product advocates.","handle":"marketing-team","is_external":false,"date_create":1446746793,"date_update":1446746793,"date_delete":0,"auto_type":null,"created_by":"U060RNRCZ","updated_by":"U060RNRCZ","deleted_by":null,"prefs":{"channels":[],"groups":[]},"user_count":"0"}}

errors.name: not_authed
errors.description: No authentication token provided.

errors.name: invalid_auth
errors.description: Invalid authentication token.

errors.name: account_inactive
errors.description: Authentication token is for a deleted user or team.

errors.name: user_is_bot
errors.description: This method cannot be called by a bot user.

errors.name: user_is_restricted
errors.description: This method cannot be called by a restricted user or single channel guest.

errors.name: invalid_arg_name
errors.description: The method was passed an argument whose name falls outside the bounds of common decency. This includes very long names and names with non-alphanumeric characters other than _. If you get this error, it is typically an indication that you have made a very malformed API call.

errors.name: invalid_array_arg
errors.description: The method was passed a PHP-style array argument (e.g. with a name like foo[7]). These are never valid with the Slack API.

errors.name: invalid_charset
errors.description: The method was called via a POST request, but the charset specified in the Content-Type header was invalid. Valid charset names are: utf-8 iso-8859-1.

errors.name: invalid_form_data
errors.description: The method was called via a POST request with Content-Type application/x-www-form-urlencoded or multipart/form-data, but the form data was either missing or syntactically invalid.

errors.name: invalid_post_type
errors.description: The method was called via a POST request, but the specified Content-Type was invalid. Valid types are: application/json application/x-www-form-urlencoded multipart/form-data text/plain.

errors.name: missing_post_type
errors.description: The method was called via a POST request and included a data payload, but the request did not include a Content-Type header.

errors.name: request_timeout
errors.description: The method was called via a POST request, but the POST data was either missing or truncated.

params.name: token
params.description:
Authentication token.
Requires scope: usergroups:write

params.name: usergroup
params.description: The encoded ID of the User Group to disable.

params.name: include_count
params.description: Include the number of users in the User Group.

methods.name: usergroups.list
methods.description: List all User Groups for a team

params.name: token
params.description:
Authentication token.
Requires scope: usergroups:read

params.name: include_disabled
params.description: Include disabled User Groups.

params.name: include_count
params.description: Include the number of users in each User Group.

params.name: include_users
params.description: Include the list of users for each User Group.

response.sample: {"ok":true,"usergroups":[{"id":"S0614TZR7","team_id":"T060RNRCH","is_usergroup":true,"name":"Team Admins","description":"A group of all Administrators on your team.","handle":"admins","is_external":false,"date_create":1446598059,"date_update":1446670362,"date_delete":0,"auto_type":"admin","created_by":"USLACKBOT","updated_by":"U060RNRCZ","deleted_by":null,"prefs":{"channels":[],"groups":[]},"user_count":"2"},{"id":"S06158AV7","team_id":"T060RNRCH","is_usergroup":true,"name":"Team Owners","description":"A group of all Owners on your team.","handle":"owners","is_external":false,"date_create":1446678371,"date_update":1446678371,"date_delete":0,"auto_type":"owner","created_by":"USLACKBOT","updated_by":"USLACKBOT","deleted_by":null,"prefs":{"channels":[],"groups":[]},"user_count":"1"},{"id":"S0615G0KT","team_id":"T060RNRCH","is_usergroup":true,"name":"Marketing Team","description":"Marketing gurus, PR experts and product advocates.","handle":"marketing-team","is_external":false,"date_create":1446746793,"date_update":1446747767,"date_delete":1446748865,"auto_type":null,"created_by":"U060RNRCZ","updated_by":"U060RNRCZ","deleted_by":null,"prefs":{"channels":[],"groups":[]},"user_count":"0"}]}
